mapper.select: select p.*,m.name from sys_power p left join sys_module m on p.module_id = m.MODULE_ID

SELECT p.* FROM sys_power p LEFT JOIN sys_role_power rp ON p.power_id = rp.power_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rp.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_emp_role er ON r.role_id = er.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_emp e ON er.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{empId}
